description: He is the pilot of a powerful and evolved Antibody, the Barons Grand Cher. At first he was just a mentor for Jonathan that temporarily he gave his Baron Grand Cher to him, which in the end he/she was actually Anoa McCormick, the missing captain of Novis Noa. Baron Maximillian takes control of Orphan all in the name of Jonathan.
name: Baron Maximillian
